comments.content:
This font can be found under many different names from different foundries.  
I list the family names/foundries - just for reference - but note that most of the following foundries are well known font forgery companies, so please be extra careful if you intend to acquire a valid license for a commercial project:

**Capable** - Copyright 1988-1999 IBS -Future Corporation  
**Catchup Medium** - ©1995-2001 Arts & Letters Corporation  
**Catchup-NO** - Copyright 1994 Bay Animation, Inc  
**Fingerpaint** - Copyright (c) 2013 by Jerak Durzan  
**First Grader** - WSI-FONT Collection [1992-1994]  
**JI-Lurers** - ArtINeed.com [2001]  
**Jerry's Game 1** - Cambridge Fontworks  
**KAJAKA** - COPYRIGHT 1997, ARC MEDIA INC.  
**KidType** - Copyright SoftMaker Software GmbH 1995  
**KiddyDB** - Copyright by Christine Mauerkirchner und Rainer Grunert  
**Kidney-Normal** - Copyright by Classic Font Corporation, USA  
**Kids CE** - Copyright (c) 1992 Corel Corporation  
**Kids Plain** - Copyright (c) 1992 Corel Corporation  
**Kids Stuff 101** - Copyright 1988-1999 IBS -Future Corporation  
**Kids\_PFL** - ProFonts Library Ver.97 Copyright (c) ScanDer Ltd. Hungary 1993-1997  
**Kidstime** - Copyright 1988-1999 IBS -Future Corporation  
**Kidz** - WSI-Font Collection [1993]  
**Playful** - Copyright 1994 Bay Animation, Inc. All Rights Reserved  
**Santa** - Copyright 1998, Ken Kirkpatrick Software  
**Senfstreifen (Scharf)** - Copyright by Data Becker, erstellt von J. Modis  
**TR Kids** - FontShop by Sherlock  
**Teslic`sDocument** - Copyright (C) 1993, Teslefantic  
**U4 Brothers 00171** - U4 Computer Group  
**VnKids** - Generated by Fontographer 4.1  
**VnKids2** - Generated by Fontographer 4.1

If somebody can spot the original one, please enlighten us.

Great list Fivos. Piracy knows no shame.  
Don
